item.title: List IPs with SSH port on the current network
item.description: CIDR and Subnet Examples Address Class No of Network Bits No of Host Bits No of IP addresses Subnet mask CIDR notation A 8 24 255.0.0.0 /8 A 9 23 255.128.0.0 /9 A 12 20 255.240.0.0 /12 A 14 18 255.252.0.0 /14 B 16 16 255.255.0.0 /16 B 17 15 255.
